STORIESof the HEART

Witness the devastation that Sudden Cardiac Arrest is having on our youth — stories of seemingly healthy young lives lost suddenly and unexpectedly to SCA, and of those who suffered severely debilitating consequences of SCA — all because the appropriate live-saving actions were not taken.

Michael Abt, Jr.

Louis Acompora

Zach Allen

Sean Anderson

Kelly Ballenger

Sharon Bannasch

Chard Barcia

Jordan Barefoot

Tariq Barfield

Anthony Bates

Cameron Batson

Jenna Becker

Ryan Birley

Justin Bonafide

Ryan Boslet

Jeffery Bowman

Legacy of the Lost is dedicated to all the young lives lost to Sudden Cardiac Arrest.

For Parents Who Have Lost A Child to Sudden Cardiac Arrest

If you are grieving the death of your child, or know bereaved parents struggling with the emotional trauma of their tragic loss, please reach out to Parent Heart Watch for support or to share your story.
